info.title: USB4SAP
info.description: Universal Synch Bridge for SAP: One API for all SAP integration, analytics and UI needs. Simplify modern analytics, apps and automations. Provision SAP data, insights and automation On-demand.

GET.summary: GET call to extract metadata & data from SAP data objects
GET.description: The GET call extracts data along with its metadata from SAP, based on the selection criteria by user or background scheduled job

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.x-example: ObjectName eq 'T001W' and ObjectType eq 'T' and Delimiter eq '|' and ImportGeneric eq 'ALVV-MG' and DataDest eq '0:0|'
